column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First the good stuff:  I am a long time Chicago area native
column2: this is my favorite deep dish.  Love the crust(I like the regular better than the buttercrust upgrade).  Always order a sausage
column4: onion - but like some of the other reviewers
column5: don't like the way they have the sausage as one large piece the same diameter as the pizza.  The flavor is great
column6: so we order it with "sausage crumbles" to take care of the too much sausage ratio.  The salad was good
column7: really enjoy our meal every time!
